if(NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/master/.git")
    message(WARNING "SimpleModularFramework submodule was not downloaded! GIT_SUBMODULE was turned off or failed.")
    message(STATUS "Checking if package was installed.")

    find_library(SMF_FOUND smf)
    if(NOT SMF_FOUND)
        message(FATAL_ERROR "Package not present, cannot continue.")
    endif()
else()
    add_subdirectory(master)
endif()
